text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/b3d33d8570bc49a7f90990572d7f9630a1bfae02|patch 8.2.0120: virtcol() does not check arguments to be valid>
patch 8.2.0120: virtcol() does not check arguments to be valid

Problem:    virtcol() does not check arguments to be valid, which may lead to
            a crash.
Solution:   Check the column to be valid.  Do not decrement MAXCOL.
            (closes #5480)

attachments.title: patch 8.2.0120: virtcol() does not check arguments to be valid 路 vim/vim@b3d33d8

Solution:   Correct the code. (closes #5483)
